name: Sir Leg-Less
description:
You are a knight with no legs! You must prove yourself by finding great riches. But your only way to get around, is with your grappling chain.

There is only one control! (excluding the reset button which should only be used if the level bugs out)

All art, programming and music was created by me (Luke Watts, LVWatts#9716) during the jam period.

Game engine used: Game Maker (GMS2)

Other software used: BeepBox and  sfxr
